12789b38-d521-4e8f-af71-1e4d6bd3ccf2: Whenever the wielder kills a target with this hand flamer, the target explodes, dealing <u>(enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to all creatures in a 2-cell radius and applies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (9).

b0b947b9-d4a5-4b04-b04a-3ba0df692859: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).
b24d1514-3f43-40a7-a891-4ae687a85d04:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.
b4f77160-a3f6-42f4-a06e-668fb8b7b286: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} 12: the first use of any attacking Navigator power does not set it on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. The second use of any Navigator power will deal an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
b78eac69-4f0c-4355-ba92-e2899f297c05:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
Each successful attack with Edge of the Irrevocable raises {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by +<u>(from 1 to 5)</u> and deals an additional +<u>(2 × veil degradation)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>all allies deal +<u>(veil degradation)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>the wielder gains +<u>(veil degradation / 5)</u> (minimum of +1) additional {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If veil degradation reaches 20, successful attacks with Edge of the Irrevocable trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If veil degradation ever drops to 0, Edge of the Irrevocable loses all its powers until the end of combat.</indent>
bbb6491e-e90b-4549-a8a4-8c9af127c5c8: If {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, using this weapon, deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, it stuns the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
bbbe734d-8e7f-4fb8-82f1-73e3d95b257e: This plasma pistol's overcharged attacks always cause a plasma explosion. This plasma explosion deals an additional +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for every rank of the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}.
bed9ccc1-db69-4430-ac51-4eb14f50225f: When this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} with a −35 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
c044f580-9352-4f72-aeb3-8984788a6dd1: Shots from this shotgun {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} targets 3 cells away even if the shot misses.
c108b630-c36f-4137-b36b-f82a8401c446:
This sword grants the following effects based on the wielder's rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Adherent: ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Votary: additionally ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Fanatic: additionally ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers</indent>
c15583b6-4f76-4c7d-b81d-d48869e1d308: The wielder of this staff (power level 6) gains the Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}
c353ab92-e762-4a98-b23e-991ac19b3270: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.
c3b30424-b70a-48e7-9890-da4e791f8956: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} 9: Allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
c448c177-583d-4235-8d18-b8db0393a7f6: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cells radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).
c49d8d02-355a-4481-8ac9-d837b78305d7: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.
c5823d3d-6b7a-4ff9-842b-3d57434922fa: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
c5d88ee0-6a4c-45ac-a35a-bf7b28cd3dcf: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
c71eff31-43a5-4391-8969-06e8caeb121e:
This knife has a 100% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} targets.
When the wielder scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this knife, the target and everyone in a 4-cell radius around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make a single attack against the nearest target.
c78f7a20-5b8b-441f-b692-632cac85e294: This lasgun deals an additional +<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with more than 60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
c90232b0-833c-4044-a7af-db8fa699022f: If this weapon's attack fully negates the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, this attack deals an additional +75% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
ccdd2610-ac2d-4ad2-964e-522bdf528580: This rifle inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target.
cec7464f-a106-4a25-80a8-2971f9c48149: This power axe deals +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if the wielder has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
d00af149-ab75-46c1-90d4-b46602d300ee: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} 5: Enemies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of the Navigator powers. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
d1b6c06f-dd9e-422d-8d20-df8713817571: This pistol deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to adjacent enemies.
d4cee490-8cc1-49b6-9502-0fade48b0bdf: Each shot with this bolter deals an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all characters adjacent to the target.
d5cef927-9717-4c1a-9897-44d1a945c674: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this bolter increases {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +10% until the end of combat.
d705c1f5-2819-4a3b-8e73-f9e99c82aa0d: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
d9da7761-6a1a-4def-a760-ce30b6a8c480: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with an arc rifle, you also attack any enemies within 2 cells of the target.
d9e0d2b0-3105-4373-8d67-4a4d4c666153: The wielder of this bolter has a 10% chance to regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} after a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. If AP was regained this way for the first time this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
deb92c50-11d8-4e23-9e68-02264112247a: This rifle can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks. Whenever the wielder scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
e08f6a55-1719-48cc-b086-afbbea338104: This shotgun has an increased attack area. Its attacks deal +150% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is decreased by −50%.
e0dad650-6846-4769-af05-456a5e5f1159: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that pushes enemies away.
e58df5c5-c09f-4478-956e-9f7aec7ec3b8: If the wielder kills an enemy with Сharge, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
e8eab615-9207-4c3b-a963-71b915af81e3: The wielder suffers −75% less mental and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
e9bc62c4-4692-40bd-868d-5eff1345e44b: Attacks with the glimmersteel blade inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
ea0a1852-ba4b-43f7-80fb-e3bbde001140:
Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after each attack and allows the wielder to move after attacking. If an attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 3 or more targets, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.
eade8c94-5410-4767-9bd5-86ee6954eca8: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} 6: The first use of an attacking Navigator power does not set the attacking Navigator powers on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. ecfc92db-ca46-49f6-99c3-0aef51724a9e: Slows enemies and inflicts +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect.
ef631d6d-bbef-42e0-b6ad-cf42e3d17539: The weapon is exquisitely decorated with human and xenoteeth, trophies from the victims of the previous owner of this weapon.
f4054f04-1138-4415-8106-6134f303b4d8: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
f6267156-3cfd-4db0-bef6-62abcafd6a2a: This blade deals an additional +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets for each common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on them.
f8e398b7-fa59-435e-b727-cddd34671882:
Decreases the target's weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −3 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} after the wielder has parried an attack.
<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
fdc2cc5e-2b66-45fa-9935-7664c98bb7f6: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level caused by this axe by +1 until the end of combat for each strike attack performed by it.
fe7dd7fd-6c53-4969-b7a3-93570505d7a8: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Increases the power of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by +1 for each successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.
feadf994-812a-41d7-a6f7-1892d4a463fa: When the wielder has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}, attacks with this sword always score critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a +100% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
ff86b17d-8711-4e2f-871d-706a357551b9: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Lightning Arc {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}
fff58819-30f5-4df1-9979-67282333a601:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
